p: The tested compounds do not display virucidal activity ( Fig 1D) nor influence virus binding or the early stages of the viral lifecycle ( Fig 2). Intriguingly, 9-ACA- and NPPB-sensitive Cl - channels were required specifically for efficient RNA replicationâ€”as evidenced by the effect of the inhibitors on the CHIKV-Fluc SGR and copy number of the CHIKV genomic and intermediate minus-strand RNA ( Fig 3). NPPB-sensitive Cl - channels appear to have a conserved function in mosquito cells, as application of the inhibitor to infected C6/36 cells led to a reduction in CHIKV replication ( Fig 5).
